metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38371 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
The STARTTLS feature in Exim through 4.94.2 allows response injection (buffering) during MTA SMTP sending.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
exim4-base - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
exim4-config - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
exim4-daemon-light - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
eximon4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the upstream Exim developers do not consider this to be a security issue, and do not believe this to be exploitable. See exim4 advisory.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.95-4ubuntu2.2').
